pages.text: 16|111|Sonohi hitobito wa jibunjishin'no (sukui no) tame ni, asette tangan suru koto ni narou. Kakujin wa (gense de no) okonai ni yori (jūbun ni) hōshō sa re, futō ni taigū se rareru koto wa nai nodearu.

16|112|Arrā wa, heion buji o tanoshinde ita hitotsu no machi no, hiyu o age rareta. Kate wa yomo kara yutaka ni kyōkyū sa retaga, arrā no onmegumi ni taishi fushinjindeatta tame ni, arrā wa (sono min ga) okashite ita (aku) koto no mukui to shite,(kyokudo no) ue to osore o aji wase rareta.

16|113|Mata kare-ra no ma kara (eraba reta) 1-ri no shito ga, hontōni kare-ra ni tsukawasa reta nodaga, sore o kyohi shita. Sore de kare-ra ga fugi o okonatte iru ma ni, chōbatsu ga kare-ra ni kudatta.
16|114|Sore de arrā ga anata gata ni sadzuke rareta, gōhō ni shite yoi mono o tabe nasai. Moshi anata gataga arrā ni tsukaerunaraba, kare no onkei ni kansha shi nasai.

16|115|Kare wa tada shi niku, chi soshite butaniku, narabini arrā igai no na ga tonae rare (tosatsu sa re)ta mono o kinji rareru. Daga yokubō no tamede wa naku,-hō o koezu, semara rete yamu woenai-sha ni wa, hontōni arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.

16|116|Anata gata no kuchi o tsuite deru itsuwari de,`koreha gōhō 〔harāru〕da, mata kore wa kinki 〔harāmu〕desu.' To itte wa naranai. Sore wa arrā ni taishi itsuwari o tsukuru monodearu. Arrā ni taishi itsuwari o tsukuru mono wa, kesshite sakaenaidearou.
16|117|(Korera no mono wa) wazukana kyōraku dake de, kare-ra ni wa itamashī chōbatsu ga arou.

16|118|Ware wa, Yudaya kyō o shinpō suru mono ni taishi, ware ga izen anata ni tsugeta mono o kinjita nodearu. Ware wa kare-ra o sokonatta wakede wanai. Daga kare-ra wa mizukara o sokonatta dakedearu.
